ygData.subject: RE: Rumor of the bards ultimate weapon?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmmm an optional cape graphics patch perhaps, he thinks hopefully.  I would dearly love to see capes and cloaks added to the character models, right after they
ygData.messageBody:
Hmmm an optional cape graphics patch perhaps, he thinks hopefully. I would
dearly love to see capes and cloaks added to the character models, right
after they fix our flute/drum/lute percussion animation.

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 27, 1999 12:55 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Rumor of the bards ultimate weapon?


From: <kim@...>

On Wed, 27 Oct 1999, Ben Wilson wrote:
>
> A fellow bard has heard rumor of a bard only "ultimate" weapon called the
> quill that procs gate. He says it is found in the Plane of Hate on the
> Maestro of Rancor. I'm skeptical by nature but he also sent me along a
> screenshot of this Maestro character in front of a huge organ. Anyone
else
> hear about this? I've got the screenshot if anyone wants to see it.

Rumors are funny things. Someone posts some info, someone
else jokes about it, someone else doesn't get the joke and
takes it as truth, and someone who didn't know any of this was
going on hears the (now wildly distorted) rumor from the last
person. The second in the above link is here:

http://www1.sitepowerup.com/mb/view.asp?Action=Reply&BoardID=105220&Reply=93
65

--
John H. Kim
kim@...

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@... with
the subject lol.
